body: This warning is a little silly, because (1) it's not true as the code is written today, and (2) you wouldn't actually know what was meant here unless you read @apaszke's comment at https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/issues/7228#issuecomment-386242514
body_html: This warning is a little silly, because (1) it's not true as the code is written today, and (2) you wouldn't actually know what was meant here unless you read @apaszke's comment at #7228 (comment)
